metadata.name: | wordstobemusic | - vol.1 #1
metadata.description: Welcome to | wordstobemusic | vol.1  — a journey to (re)discover music through creative writing. Poems, tales, and one short story inspired by the state of mind music put a writer in. In this journey, you’ll dive into music reviews highlighting what music’s essence can inspire us to feel and/or create. Music reviews offer an escape from life’s noise to unwind your mind, just for a moment, and (re)discover music. The first volume you’re about to dive into will take you to the Montreux Jazz Festival and the Paleo Festival Nyon in Switzerland. You’ll encounter the tales inspired by John Legend, Paolo Nutini, Melody Gardot, Woodkid, Herbie Hancock, Jamie Cullum, Suzane, Flèche Love, DJ Snake, Gaël Faye, OrelSan, and Stromae’s performances. Easy fullscreen access: https://vol1.wordstobemusic.com/ {more volumes will drop in the future} What if poetry met words on music? Words truly, | wordstobepoetry |
